name: Spawn of Evil
overview: Spawn of Evil for Spectrum by Dk'Tronics on Tape. Works on 16k and upwards. 1983 shoot-em-up with a 3/5 rating in Home Computing Weekly. Deep into the galactic void, hosts of alien spawn go through a complex multi-stage breeding cycle. Your task is to seek out and smash the cycle to eliminate the spawn before it matures to full attack potential. This is the most spectacular 3D space game ever written fir this 16K Spectrum.
